column3: Based in the Auvergnat spa town of Vichy, the French government often proved more zealous than its masters in suppressing civil liberties and drawing up anti-Jewish legislation.

column3: Built in 1870, its canopy of stained glass and cast iron is the oldest in Dublin; its enthusiastic interior decoration is also typical of the era.
column4: It was constructed in 1870 and has the oldest canopy in Dublin.
